class_notes: (Letter Grade Only) Permission Required Prior to Enrollment
course_description: This course occurs over two semesters, one credit hour in the fall (745A) and 2 credits in the spring (745B). Topics include intellectual disability/autism, metabolic conditions, chromosome anomalies, imprinting disorders, bone dysplasias, hemoglobinopathies, metabolic conditions and newborn screening, trinucleotide repeat disorders, connective tissue disorders, neuromuscular and neurogenetic diseases, as well as other single gene disorders and select conditions by organ system.
sections: Class Nbr: 1406, Section #: 000, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: S. Wechsler, Status: Open
